Articles.Content:
So I derped up.

 I wanted to add a pilot name to the outside of the Mk.1 cockpit like is seen in Top Gun, so I got a .dds addon for Photoshop.

I made the edit and then found that I have no idea how to work with .dds files.

Long story short, I broke the texture. Does anyone have either the settings for the stock texture or the texture its self for KSP 1.0.5?

I think part of the problem is that I mixed up game versions and file locations and put the texture from v1.3 into the v1.0.5 files.
